params._origin: The id for the origin domain of the message
params._sender: The remote Gateway contract (on the origin domain)

params._interchainSecurityModule: The address of the chosen interchain security module
params._mailbox: The address of the local mailbox
params._receiver: The address of the local message receiver (EverclearSpoke)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

params._chainId: The id of the destination chain
params._gasLimit: The gas limit for delivering the message

returns._fee: The fee to send the message

params._chainId: the chain id of the gateway to be removed

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

sendMessage(uint32,bytes,uint256).details: only called by the spoke contract

params._chainId: The id of the destination chain
params._gasLimit: The gas limit to use on destination

returns._feeSpent: The fee spent to send the message
returns._messageId: The id message of the transport layer

sendMessage(uint32,bytes,uint256,uint256.details: only called by the spoke contract

params._chainId: The id of the destination chain
params._fee: The fee to send the message
params._gasLimit: The gas limit to use on destination

returns._feeSpent: The fee spent to send the message
returns._messageId: The id message of the transport layer

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._securityModule: The address of the new security module

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

chainGateways(uint32).notice: Returns the chain gateway address for the chain id

handle(uint32,bytes32,bytes).notice: Handles incoming messages from the mailbox

mailbox().notice: Returns the transport layer message routing smart contract

quoteMessage(uint32,bytes,uint256).notice: Quotes cost of sending a message to the transport layer

receiver().notice: Returns the message receiver for this Gateway (EverclearHub / EverclearSpoke)

sendMessage(uint32,bytes,uint256).notice: Send a message to the transport layer

sendMessage(uint32,bytes,uint256,uint256.notice: Send a message to the transport layer using the gas tank
